title: Client Wont Update Error Code 004
body: My Client wont update its stuck on 0% i see the files being downloaded but its stuck at 0% and then i get a message saying error code 004 patch failed try restarting.I tried restarting client and even tried going on the legacy client but it wont work.Tried Full repair and didnt work either. Please help

replies.body: Generally, at this point in the process something is blocking the patcher from reading your game files.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Glad everything is okay now!
Update: I Fixed it just was annoying to redownload and reconfigure everything again i just deleted Riot Games Folder on my Hard Drive and re-installed Everything

Been Trying for over 1 hour and 1/2 to get this to work i deleted league and re-installed it but it wont even update to league of legends alpha client and now it wont even launch it just says re-install league of legends alpha client again.
